text: First time visit this TCM even though I have to walk further from my home where many TCM readily available.  I decided to give it a try and to my surprised that their price is very reasonable and Doctor Heng also impressed me by his knowledge amd explained what type of injuries that i might had. He is very friendly and that day there is one Korean, during conversation I overhead  he decided  to visit him after seeing western doctor.

Dr Yong was really good and experienced! Very sweet to check on my comfort level before administering any treatment. Couldnâ€™t lift my arms above my ear before I went in but could raise it above my head after. Will definitely come back next time.

Dr Heng is very kind and informative, I went to him for severe gastric issues, was puking, bloated and unable to eat everyday. After just 1-2 acupuncture sessions and medicine given by Dr Heng, I felt 90% better. Am able to eat well, not feel nauseous and pain anymore! Highly recommend!

Dr Heng is professional and very good at what he does. He explained to me the reason for my ailments and also the treatment plan. Definitely recommend this clinic for TCM treatment. My issues have been resolved!

Dr Heng is very friendly, patient and very knowledgeable in Chinese medicine and acupuncture. Happy to have known one that can rely on for better health improvements going forward. Thank you, Dr Heng.
